# ngauth - OAuth 2.0 & OpenID Connect Testing Server

**ngauth** is a lightweight OAuth 2.0 authorization server and OpenID Connect (OIDC) provider specifically designed for **integration testing**, **development environments**, and **CI/CD pipelines**.

## Perfect for Testing OAuth Applications

- ✅ **OAuth 2.0 Testing** - Test OAuth clients without external dependencies
- ✅ **OIDC Testing** - Verify OpenID Connect flows in your tests
- ✅ **Testcontainers Integration** - First-class Testcontainers support
- ✅ **JWT Testing** - Test JWT token validation and claims
- ✅ **Fast Startup** - 2-3 seconds startup time
- ✅ **Zero Configuration** - Works out-of-the-box

## Search Keywords

`oauth testing`, `oauth server`, `oauth mock`, `oidc testing`, `oauth testcontainers`, `oauth integration testing`, `jwt testing`, `oauth development`, `oauth ci cd`, `openid connect testing`, `oauth2 test server`, `authorization server testing`, `oauth docker`, `oauth nodejs`, `lightweight oauth server`

## Use Cases

- Integration testing of OAuth clients
- Testing OpenID Connect flows
- Development environments
- CI/CD pipelines
- Learning OAuth 2.0 and OIDC
- Prototyping OAuth-enabled applications

## Alternative to

- Keycloak (too heavy for testing)
- Auth0 (requires external service)
- WireMock OAuth (limited OIDC support)
- Custom OAuth mocks (limited features)

**Repository**: https://github.com/ngauth/server
**Docker Hub**: https://hub.docker.com/r/ngauth/server
